column3: For the years ended December 31, 2018 and December 31, 2016, 2.0 million and 0.6 million weighted-average nonvested restricted stock units, respectively, and 0.5 million and 0.5 million weighted-average stock options, respectively, have been excluded from the computation of diluted earnings (loss) per common share as their inclusion would be antidilutive due to our loss attributable to The Williams Companies, Inc.
